entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is a ghost who is being talked about by Hermione. She has a small, see-through face and is referred to as 'Fat Myrtle', 'Ugly Myrtle', and 'Miserable, moaning, moping Myrtle' by others.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is talking about Myrtle. She tries to be kind to Myrtle but Peeves interrupts her.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who is teasing Myrtle and interrupting Hermione's attempts to be kind to her.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is being nudged by Hermione in an attempt to make him agree with her about Myrtle.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who is also being nudged by Hermione in an attempt to make him agree with her about Myrtle.

relationships.description: Hermione tries to be kind to Myrtle but Peeves interrupts her.
Peeves teases Myrtle and interrupts Hermione's attempts to be kind to her.
Hermione nudges Harry in an attempt to make him agree with her about Myrtle.
Hermione nudges Ron in an attempt to make him agree with her about Myrtle.
